SELECT p.product_no, p.product_name, c.common_detail_name AS product_unit, TO_CHAR(p.product_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS product_date, p.product_type FROM product p LEFT JOIN common_detail c ON p.product_unit = c.common_detail_code WHERE 1 = 1
AND p.product_name LIKE '%' || #{productName} || '%'
AND TRUNC(p.product_date, 'MONTH') = TO_DATE(#{searchMonth}, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY p.product_no DESC

SELECT * FROM(SELECT mtr_no AS item_no, mtr_name AS item_name, mtr_unit AS item_unit, '자재' AS item_type FROM material UNION ALL SELECT product_no AS item_no, product_name AS item_name, product_unit AS item_unit, product_type AS item_type FROM product WHERE product_type = '반제품' ) all_select WHERE item_name LIKE '%' || #{item_name} || '%' ORDER BY item_type, item_name

SELECT b.bom_no AS bom_no, b.product_no AS product_no, m.mtr_name AS mtr_name, p2.product_name AS product_name, b.bom_unit AS bom_unit, b.bom_quantity AS bom_quantity, b.bom_date AS bom_date, b.bom_status AS bom_status, b.process_name AS process_name FROM bom b INNER JOIN product p ON b.product_no = p.product_no LEFT JOIN material m ON b.mtr_no = m.mtr_no LEFT JOIN product p2 ON b.mtrproduct_no = p2.product_no WHERE p.product_no = #{product_no} ORDER BY b.bom_no
